pageDescription: Learn about Merge Fellas Club's story, mission, and team. We are dedicated to providing high-quality online pet merging games and gaming community experiences.
pageKeywords: About Merge Fellas Club, pet merging games, online games, puzzle games, capybara games, free games

heroSection.title: About Merge Fellas Club
heroSection.subtitle: An Online Platform Focused on Pet Merging Games
heroSection.content: Merge Fellas Club is your ultimate online pet merging game platform. Join our growing gaming community today!

missionSection.title: Our Mission
missionSection.content: Merge Fellas Club's mission is to make games more fun, accessible, and inclusive, providing a vibrant community for all players. We believe games are not just entertainment, but a powerful medium for connecting people, inspiring creativity, and promoting learning.
missionSection.contentHtml:
Merge Fellas Club's mission is to make games more fun, accessible, and inclusive, providing a vibrant community for all players.

We believe games are not just entertainment, but a powerful medium for connecting people, inspiring creativity, and promoting learning.

values.title: Accessibility
values.description: Providing free, no-download gaming experiences, removing barriers to entry

values.title: Diverse Experiences
values.description: Offering various game modes including Cat Mode, Dog Mode, and Capybara Mode to satisfy different player preferences

values.title: Community Interaction
values.description: Building a friendly, supportive environment where players can share experiences and connect

values.title: Quality Assurance
values.description: Carefully crafting every game detail to ensure a high-quality user experience

contactSection.title: Contact Us
contactSection.content: We welcome your feedback, suggestions, or cooperation proposals at any time. Whether you want to recommend a game, suggest improvements, or discuss potential collaboration opportunities, please feel free to contact us.
contactSection.contentHtml: We welcome your feedback, suggestions, or cooperation proposals at any time. Whether you want to recommend a game, suggest improvements, or discuss potential collaboration opportunities, please feel free to contact us.

questions.question: Are all games free?
questions.answer: Yes, all games on Merge Fellas Club are provided for free. We believe games should be open to everyone, without any paywalls.
questions.answerHtml: Yes, all games on Merge Fellas Club are provided for free. We believe games should be open to everyone, without any paywalls.

questions.question: Do I need to create an account to play games?
questions.answer: No. You can visit our website and start playing directly without registration. However, creating an account allows you to save game progress, participate in comments, and more.
questions.answerHtml: No. You can visit our website and start playing directly without registration. However, creating an account allows you to save game progress, participate in comments, and more.

questions.question: What game modes does Merge Fellas offer?
questions.answer: Merge Fellas offers multiple game modes, including Cat Mode, Dog Mode, and Capybara Mode. Each mode has unique characters and challenges, making the gaming experience more diverse and engaging.
questions.answerHtml: Merge Fellas offers multiple game modes, including Cat Mode, Dog Mode, and Capybara Mode. Each mode has unique characters and challenges, making the gaming experience more diverse and engaging.

questions.question: What devices does Merge Fellas Club support?
questions.answer: Our platform supports a variety of devices, including desktop computers, laptops, tablets, and smartphones. Our responsive design ensures the best experience on any screen.
questions.answerHtml: Our platform supports a variety of devices, including desktop computers, laptops, tablets, and smartphones. Our responsive design ensures the best experience on any screen.
